dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1977
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Amid the beauty of Staten Island she recalls the time of her conversion. Noting the 50th anniversary of the execution of Sacco and Vanzetti she defines Catholic Worker anarchism. Comments on her Scripture reading.
